    • 构造器详细资料

      • HtmlFormatter4WD

        public HtmlFormatter4WD(java.lang.String fileName,
                java.lang.String nodesList)
        construct with parameter intialize and check.
        参数:
        fileName - the whole path and name of the xml log file
        nodesList - the key names you want to record into html logs
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • 方法详细资料

      • xmlTansToHtml

        public void xmlTansToHtml(long startTime,
                 long endTime)
        get html file content, and write to the new html file. if needed, delete xml log file finally.
        参数:
        startTime - the milliseconds when you start your test
        endTime - the milliseconds when you stop your test

      • xmlParse

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> xmlParse(long startTime,
                                        long endTime)
        read the xml log file into list, choosen by your nodes select.
        参数:
        startTime - the milliseconds when you start your test
        endTime - the milliseconds when you stop your test
        返回:
        xml file content in list, choosen by your nodes select
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • loadDocument

        private org.w3c.dom.Document loadDocument()
        load your xml log file, parse and return document object.
        返回:
        the document of your xml file, loaded as domfactory
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • htmlBodyHead

        private java.lang.String htmlBodyHead(long startTime,
                            long endTime)
        get html file content title and table.
        参数:
        startTime - the milliseconds when you start your test
        endTime - the milliseconds when you stop your test
        返回:
        the first part html body
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • writeHtml

        private void writeHtml(long startTime,
             long endTime,
             java.lang.String htmlBody)
        write loop to append formatted html to new log file.
        参数:
        startTime - the milliseconds when you start your test
        endTime - the milliseconds when you stop your test
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • getOutputWriter

        private java.io.OutputStreamWriter getOutputWriter(java.io.File outputFile,
                                         java.lang.String encode)
        create and return OutputStreamWriter.
        参数:
        outputFile - File to write
        encode - the encode of the output file
        返回:
        OutputStreamWriter
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
